title: BiteClub
author: BiteClub
content: https://play.biteclub.io/Home to Solana's first PvP gaming platform.In operation for over 12 months, daily rewards given to the most active players including free spins and card picks for the lucky.All the information about the platform can be found here:https://docs.biteclub.io/home/start-hereWe look forward to seeing some new faces on the BiteClub platform or around the discord.Thanks for your time, have a great day, please feel free to ask any questions.

comments.author: klarki
comments.body: Welcome! Can you provide some kind of bonus to forum members? Do you have some mechanism for checking the fairness of the results?(Such as Provably fair)

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Welcome to the forum.Just had a quick look and I have to agree that site design is beautiful. I was impressed by the design. It took me a little time to get back from the website.Do you allow Bitcoin? If I'm correct, NO. You have to remove the topic to Altcoin Marketplace section.Consider purchasing copper membership and post a nice announcement topic.Purchase here- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=credit;promoteLastly, consider running promo campaigns here to attract the community. Maybe offering some competition, running a signature campaign. Feel free to send me a message here or telegram. I have been providing such services for years and right now, managing a campaign for almost same to your project.

comments.author: BiteClub
comments.body: Quote from: klarki on February 16, 2023, 11:30:53 PMWelcome! Can you provide some kind of bonus to forum members? Do you have some mechanism for checking the fairness of the results?(Such as Provably fair)We do not have this implemented at this time but its something we would be willing to do.

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: Welcome to the forum mate. The site’s design is good and unique. I haven’t seen this type of game in the past few years. But I can see that, No Players is active on the site. The site seems to me as dead. Moreover you said 12 months passed since you have launched the casino, but till now, no user is active or regularly playing here? The Announcement thread here also looks boring. It seems like you don’t care about any traffic that you need from the forum. Nevertheless nothing I can say more. Just wishing you best of luck for your future.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: I just have a question concerning the type of wallet that can be connected to the site. I see the option of three different wallets which are; Solfare, Phantom and Slope. What about those who don't have any of these wallets? Does that mean they can connect to the site? I use metamask wallet to hold my altcoins although I didn't try to connect my wallet ( no time to create a new wallet just to check out the site might do that when I'm free). If I should try with metamask or trust wallet will it connect?

comments.author: SquirrelJulietGarden
comments.body: Quote from: Cantsay on February 17, 2023, 02:38:53 AMI just have a question concerning the type of wallet that can be connected to the site. I see the option of three different wallets which are; Solfare, Phantom and Slope.They are wallets that compatible with Solana blockchain.QuoteWhat about those who don't have any of these wallets? Does that mean they can connect to the site?Simple. Create your new wallet to use.QuoteI use metamask wallet to hold my altcoins although I didn't try to connect my wallet ( no time to create a new wallet just to check out the site might do that when I'm free). If I should try with metamask or trust wallet will it connect?Metamask is a wallet for Ethereum-based blockchains and it is not compatible with Solana blockchain so you can not use it.It is not good to use one wallet for everything, every site and store all your fund in that wallet. Have you ever thought that what will happen if that wallet is hacked?Do you want to lose all your fund by only one accident?If I only want to use Metamask, I will create different wallets to use on different sites.

comments.author: len01
comments.body: welcome to the forum mate!I just opened the biteclub site and it looks very attractive and very good.but unfortunately this is only for solana coins to bet on this site and i hope to add other coins especially bitcoins. because almost all gamblers here prefer to use bitcoins for gambling, although some gamblers also like other coins.oh yeah, see the suggestions from other forum members to buy copper members so they can post more interesting pictures for your JST threads. so that when there are new customers here they will be interested in trying your site.I hope you will have success through this forum and consider the suggestions of other members.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: the minimum bet limit on coinflip 0.01 SOL seems quite large, maybe it can be even smaller so you can play longer with 1 SOL. lolI think this site is still under development there are some dice roll games not available it seems or I have to log in to connect my wallet to take a look. BTW welcome to the forum

comments.author: NicNacCoin
comments.body: Welcome BiteClub platform.You should attract users through various attractive incentives/bonuses. Also you can get your platform promoted by some of the reputed managers of our bitcoin forum who promote such platforms.@Little Mouse@Hhampase@Royse777@icopressConsult the above managers and take good advice on how to run your platform's promotion campaign on the forum. You have to remember one thing that we have countless users in this forum who are directly and indirectly involved with various Casino, Betting, Gambling,pokering, dice game etc platforms. If you can run the promotion campaign properly then your BiteClub platform will become very popular very soon.

comments.author: btc78
comments.body: Quote from: piebeyb on February 17, 2023, 06:27:17 AMthe minimum bet limit on coinflip 0.01 SOL seems quite large, maybe it can be even smaller so you can play longer with 1 SOL. lolI think this site is still under development there are some dice roll games not available it seems or I have to log in to connect my wallet to take a look. BTW welcome to the forum  well , 0.01 Solana is amounting at least 22 cents$ as I am posting this  and I think that is not a Big amount per bet in Coinflip   since the game is decided easily and players (I am one of those lol)  but yeah if they can bring it lower like at least 5 cents per bet ? then it would be better for small roller like us.__________________________OP Welcome to the Forum guys , and Looking for more  updates with also accepting Bitcoin ASAP lol.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: Little Mouse on February 16, 2023, 11:32:27 PMWelcome to the forum.Just had a quick look and I have to agree that site design is beautiful. I was impressed by the design. It took me a little time to get back from the website.Do you allow Bitcoin? If I'm correct, NO. You have to remove the topic to Altcoin Marketplace section.Consider purchasing copper membership and post a nice announcement topic.Purchase here- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=credit;promoteThere is no way to deposit Bitcoin you have to connect your wallet to the site before you can log in, so it doesn't deserve to be in this section, but it is recommended that he get a copper account.I like to ask OP if there is a possibility to add Bitcoin as one of the payments so you can remain in this section, I'm sure you'll get more buzz and more players if your platform remains in this section.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Quote from: BiteClub on February 16, 2023, 11:59:31 PMRoger that! Thanks for the feedback.Hello and welcome to bitcointalk. Please take the time to read the unofficial rules of the forum https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=703657.0 and familiarize yourself with them. Good luck with your site and good luck on the forum.

comments.author: tabas
comments.body: Welcome here, I think it's better to name the tab whenever someone visits biteclub into BiteClub instead of Degen Games. You only have three options to login and those are with different wallets that can be connected to biteclub. Looking at the website, you seem don't accept bitcoin yet. At the same time, if you've been operating for 12 months, you should have some easy FAQ page where everyone can understand the login, deposits/withdrawals and other stuff related to your games.

comments.author: Stakefast
comments.body: Reserving this spot for a future review

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Quote from: BiteClub on February 16, 2023, 11:06:09 PMhttps://play.biteclub.io/Home to Solana's first PvP gaming platform.In operation for over 12 months, daily rewards given to the most active players including free spins and card picks for the lucky.All the information about the platform can be found here:https://docs.biteclub.io/home/start-hereWe look forward to seeing some new faces on the BiteClub platform or around the discord.Thanks for your time, have a great day, please feel free to ask any questions.Welcome to bitcointalk. And although most likely your thread will be transferred to the  Service Announcements (Altcoins) board since your online casino site is play.biteclub.io it doesn't support bitcoin payments, but it looks old-school. In the casino I see so far only the Degen mode or is there a casino has its own bankroll?

comments.author: Eureka_07
comments.body: Quote from: BiteClub on February 16, 2023, 11:06:09 PM<snip>Nice and very functional website. The only thing I do not like about browsing your website is that you over-used the spaces. You did not leave any margin at all, the most recognizable module here was the Coinflip. I suggest that you should place the bets panel and the game itself closer to one another. It's so wide to that it became harder and harder to see from a wider screen. One more thing, your leaderboard, why does it have no data at all?

comments.author: danadc
comments.body: I really like what they are offering here, the fact that they use the Solana network to make transactions is fantastic for how cheap it can be, in a casino the more you save the better, it would be great if you give more details of all the games, and It is something different, we have all seen that the transactions that are used are the most popular networks.What PvP games do you have in mind? That is something that I really like, I imagine that poker is one of the games that has the greatest strength, I really want to try it, and what else do you plan to place? There are games that require a lot of concentration, chess is one, have you thought about it?

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: Welcome to Bitcointalk forum. Any plans on giving bonuses to Bitcointalk forum members only or bonuses for everyone?. I think it is normal nowadays that a casino will give bonuses to their players especially new players. Since this is posted here then does that mean more crypto will be accepted in this platform like Bitcoin?. If that's what it is then this thread won't be moved in altcoins and I can't find FAQ or Terms and conditions or similiar to it.
